questions.text: Which company uses a 'Swoosh' as its logo?
questions.explanation: The Nike Swoosh was designed by student Carolyn Davidson in 1971 for $35.

questions.text: The 'Golden Arches' are associated with which fast food chain?
questions.explanation: The Golden Arches have been a symbol of McDonald's since 1953.

questions.text: Which tech company's logo is a bitten apple?
questions.explanation: Apple's logo is a silhouette of an apple with a bite taken out of it.

questions.text: What animal appears in the Ferrari logo?
questions.explanation: The 'Prancing Horse' (Cavallino Rampante) is the symbol of Ferrari.

questions.text: Which coffee chain uses a twin-tailed siren in its logo?
questions.explanation: The Starbucks logo features a stylized twin-tailed siren (mermaid).

questions.text: Which brand's slogan is 'Just Do It'?
questions.explanation: Nike introduced the 'Just Do It' campaign in 1988.

questions.text: The Olympic rings consist of how many interlaced rings?
questions.explanation: The five rings represent the five inhabited continents of the world.

questions.text: Which luxury brand uses an interlocking 'LV' monogram?
questions.explanation: The LV monogram is the signature of Louis Vuitton.

questions.text: Which social media platform uses a blue bird logo?
questions.explanation: Twitter famously used a blue bird named Larry before rebranding to 'X'.

questions.text: Which car manufacturer has a logo with four interlocking rings?
questions.explanation: The four rings represent the merger of four automobile manufacturers into Auto Union (Audi).

questions.text: Which brand's mascot is 'Tony the Tiger'?
questions.explanation: Tony the Tiger says, 'They're Gr-r-reat!' for Kellogg's Frosted Flakes.

questions.text: Which shipping company is known for its brown trucks and uniforms?
questions.explanation: UPS (United Parcel Service) is familiarly known as 'Big Brown'.

questions.text: Which operating system uses a penguin mascot named Tux?
questions.explanation: Tux the Penguin is the official mascot of the Linux kernel.

questions.text: Which energy drink uses the slogan 'Gives You Wings'?
questions.explanation: Red Bull's marketing campaign claims it 'Gives You Wings'.

questions.text: Which streaming service uses a red 'N' logo?
questions.explanation: Netflix uses a stylized red 'N' ribbon as its icon.
